name: Kingdom Come (Cryo)
description:
Its not easy surviving in the Early days of the Scottish independence, the war began in the early 14th Century when The Kingdom of England wanted to colonize Scotland, now its your chance to fight! pick your side of the story, who will you succumb to?

Credits:

  • CryoCyanide - Lead Programmer
  • Podi - Game Designer
  • Steyn - Game Manager
  • Tiano - Audio Producer
  • Zakiel - 2D/3D Artist
